Anonymous Hacker Phu Nih Russia Cu ”Cyber War” A Thanh.
Ukraine ram ralkap thazang in a tutu Russia President Putin Cozah cu Anonymous Hacker phu nih ”Cyber War” a thanh colh ve.
Anonymous Hacker phu nihcun Russia cozah Cyber War a thanhnak cu zahan (february 24) ah an Twitter ah an tar i ” Anonymous Hacker Phu nih Russia Cozah cu Cyber in kan tuk va cang hna” tiah an tar in suimilam cheu hrawng a rauh ah Russia Cozah a dirkamh biktu TV channel simi ”Russia Today”(RT) website kan thah piak khawh hna tiah an van thanh colh tthan.
Tuzing ah Russia Today website cu kau khawh a si tilo i kau len ”Click” len zong ah ”error” peng a si cang tiah Daily Mail nih a tar langh ve.
Kawlram Media Akonthi timi zong nih Myanmar times zaanlei slm 4:00 Russia Today cu kan kau nain a ngahlo tiah an langhter ve.

India ram Baptist Kohhran Hmeichhe hruaitu lu ber atan Mizo
ZALEN, Oct. 4, 2024: India ram puma Baptist Kohhran hmeichhe pawl hruaitu lu ber atan Mizo nu thlan a ni.
Thawhlehni leh Ningani inkara Chennai, Tamil Nadu-a India Baptist Women’s Union (IBWU) General Assembly vawi 15-na neihah president atan Rbt. Dr. Zoramthangi, Mizoram Baptist Kohhran Hmeichhe Pawl (MBKHP) hi thlan a ni.
IBWU president thar, Rbt. Dr. Zoramthangi hi Serkawn, Lungleia awm niin BCM Serkawnah rawngbawltu a ni a. MBKHP–ah hruaitu hlun niin Executive Committee member-ah 2015-18 chhung a awm tawh a, kum 2018-24 chhungin finance secretary hna chelhin tunah hian Executive Committee Member a ni leh mek.
Tun tum IBWU inkhawmpuiah hian thupui atan I Thessolonika 5:11 tlawhchhanin ‘I in dawmkang tawn zel ang u’ (Build each other up) tih hman a ni a. A chhim hian MBKHP atangin hruaitute leh member an kal.
MBKHP hruaitute hi chanvo pawimawh tak tak pek an ni a, MBKHP Secretary Nl. Lalhmingmawii Chongthu-in Cultural Night-ah hun hmangin a kaihruai a, Rbt. HK Lallianzauvi, President MBKHP-in seminar kaihruaiin F. Zanguri’n hruaitu boralte sunna hun a hmang a. President thar hian a tawp zan inkhawm a kaihhruai bawk.
Kum 2024-2029 atana hruaitu tur thlan niin hruaitu tharte lawmluhna leh hlanna neih a ni.
Kum 2024-29 hruaitu turte:
President: Dr Zoramthangi (MBKHP)
Vice President: Pulla Sampurna (TBUTWF)
Secretary: Ruth Anand, Bangalore
Treasurer: Bonjera Sangma, Garo

Min Aung Hlaian kum 62 tlin hunah chauh sorkar hnathawkte pension chawlh pe tura order a chhuah rualin kum 60 tling sorkar hnathawk 2841 te pension theih hun hnawlin a thawh zawm tir tih hriat a ni.
Min Aung Hlaian order letter no. 16/2022 hmangin sorkar hnathawk kum 60 tlin hnua pension mai tawh turte chu kum 62 tlin thleng thawk chhunzawm turin thuchhuah a siam a. Chu a thupek avangin, kum 60 tling pension thei tawh sorkar hnathawk 3000 dawnte pension hun tur chu tikhawtlaiin, sorkar hna thawh chhunzawmtir an ni a.
Retire-a pension mai tawh tura lo inruahman lawk sorkar hnathawk 2607 te leh Deferred Leave hmang mek 234 te chu pension-tir mai lovin, sorkar hnathawk 2841 te chu thawk chhunzawm leh turin order a chhuah thu hriat a ni.

Nimin khan Serchhip District-ah Covid-19 hri kai mi 83 hmuh belh leh an ni a, hengte nen hian Serchhip District-a hri kai hmuhchhuah tawh zawng zawng chu mi 2574 an tling ta a, hetihlai hian nimin khan hrikai enkawlna hmun aṭangin mi 72 chhuahtir leh niin, hengte nen hian mi 2034-te chuan hri kai enkawl-na hmun an chhuahsan tawh a, Serchhip district-a hri kai hmuhchhuah boral chu mi 5 an ni tawh a, tunah hian enkawl lai mi 574 an la awm mek a ni. Hetihlai hian Covid-19 hri venna (vaccine) pawh pek chhuah chhunzawm zel niin, nimin khan Serchhip District chhunga hri venna pekna hmun pali aṭangin 336-te chu venna pek leh an ni a, heng zinga 14-te hi first dose la niin, mi 322-te chu second dose la an ni.

h nimin khan Khawlailung playground-ah Hockey Exhibition Match cum Skill show talent search neih a ni.

Academy awmna District naupangten an hmang \angkai tawk lo tih sawiin, Khawlailung a\ang pawhin Hockey zirna School-ah a tam

hi Ministry of Women and Child Develoment hmalakna niin a scheme in a tum ber chu hmeichhe naupangte venhim leh zirna lama chher puitlin a ni a. India ram chhung District hrang hrangah kalpui niin Serchhip District-ah pawh tunah hian kalpui mek a ni a. Hmalakna tam tak zinga pakhat, Hockey lamah hmeichhe naupangte theihna zawnchhuah runpui chu tunah hian neih mek a ni. Khawlailung bakah hian E. Lungdar-ah te, Lungpho-ah te pawh he programme hi kalpui zui zel tur a ni ang.

Kevin Durant chuan Brooklyn Nets-ah a jersey number hak a thlak tur thu sawiin, No. 7 hak a tum niin a sawi.
Kum 12 chhung chu NBA khawvelah Kevin Durant hian jersey No. 35 a ha char char a, a khelhna a thlak thar takah chuan a jersey number pawh thlak a rilruk zui a. Bung thar a kai dawn avangin number thar pawh hi a hak dawn phah niin a sawi a ni.
Durant chuan, “35 khan kei leh ka chhungte chu Seat Pleasant, MD atangin min hruai kual a, khawvel min hrutpui a. Basketball ka khelh vang hian ka t
... (203 chars skipped) ... 
i thleng a, ka duhthusam thlentirin, Seattle-ah NBA khel thei turin min thlenpui zui a. 35 hian Oklahoma City-a basketball khelh min phalsak a, dam chhungin inzawmna nghet tak kan nei reng tawh dawn a ni,” a ti bawk.
A sawi zelnaah, “35 hian Bay Area-ah min hruai thleng a, championship title pahnih la theiin min siam bawk a. 35 hi ka tana mi pawimawh em em, keima hnaivai tak tana ka thlan a ni a; amaherawhchu, tunah chuan bung thar ka kai dawn a, hei vang hian ka number pawh a thar ka hmang dawn
... (203 chars skipped) ...
 million a hlawh thei dawn a ni.
Kumin September thlaah hian Durant chuan kum 31 a tling tawh dawn a, postseason-ah a average chu 32.3 points, 51% field shooting, 44% 3-point range, 90% free throw line te a ni a NBA huang chhungah chuan postseason vawi khata game thum chhunga average point 30 nei thei hmasa ber a ni.
Pathianniah khan Nets chuan Durant chu an tlangzarh chiah a, kar hmasaah khan Golden State Warriors chuan Durant-a number hak thin 35 chu tu mah haktir an tum tawh loh thu an puang.

@ Lyon chuan France forward Alexandre Lacazette, 31, Arsenal hnena £46.6m-a an hralh aṭanga kum 5 hnuah free tansfer-a laklet leh an duh. (L’Equipe)
@ Arsenal chuan kumin nipuia Leicester City chhuahsan tur Belgium midfielder Youri Tielemans, 25, lakluh dan an zawng. (Fabrizio Romano)
@ Barcelona chuan lakluh an tum ber, kumin nipuia Bayern Munich chhuahsan tur Robert Lewandowski, 33, chu an chhuahsan lo a nih chuan Chelsea forward Romelu Lukaku, 29, lam hawi an tum. (Mundo Deportivo)
@ Mancheser City forward Gabriel Jesus, 25, leh defender Oleksandr Zichenko, 25-te chu kumin nipuiah an chhuak mai thei a, hetihlai hian England winger Raheem Sterling, 27, chauh chu club lian pangngaia lut tur a nih hmel. (The Athletic)
@ Brentford chuan Denmark player Christian Eriksen chu hun rei zawk daih tur contract an zawrh a, kum 30 mi chhanna hi an nghak mek a ni. (Sky Sports)
@ Tun thla tawpa Manchester United-a contract hmang zo tur France midfielder Paul Pogba chu Juventus-ah a kir ṭep tawh a, kum 29 mi hian Italian club tan hian kum 3 daih contract ziak tura beisei a ni. (Goal)
@ Argentina striker kum 24 mi Lautaro Martinez chuan a hma lam hun turah sawi neuh neuh a awm lai mekin season tharah Inter Milan-a la awm zui zel a duh thu a sawi. (90 Min)
@ Netherlands defender Nathan Ake, 27, chu Manchester City a chhuahsan theih thu hrilh a ni a, Newcastle a panna kawng a inhawng niin a lang. (Talksport)

Kayah State, Hpruso peng, raltlan sakhan sungah nulepa ni an tuah, July 26 khi nulepa ni a si nan thuhla a phunphun ruangah a ni tak ah an tuah thei lo ih July 31 sun ah an tuahsuak.
Nulepa pawl hnenah upatnak an hlan ih thlacam saknak an nei. Himi raltlan sakhan sungah nulepa 60 an um ih nauhak 150 hrawng an um.
Ṭuanvo neitu in, “Kan tumtahmi cu in duhdawttu nulepa, saya/sayama le in bawmtu zaten hnenih lungawithu sim a si. Raltlan dinhmun ih tuah kan si ruangah kan tuah picang thei lo.
Nulepa ni ah kum upa nulepa le mual liamzo nulepa pawl hrangah thlacamnak kan nei. Thazang aummi arsa sawhciar kan dawng, hlasaknak le laksawng peknak kan nei ih leknak kan tuah” a ti.

Hakha, Cawbuk khua ih um Van Lian Mang (kum 23) cu May 13 ah inn ihsin a suak ih tu ni tiang a tlung hrihlo ruangah a sung le pawl thinphang, mangbang vansang in an um.
A hlo mi Van Lian Mang hi a nauhak lai ihsin caihnat a nei ih Lungthin lam khal tlasamdeuh a si. Pi Doi Thluai fapa a siih, kum 12 hrawng a si lai ah ni 3 sung a hlo dah ih Thantlang lam ah hmu leh sal a rak si dah.
A nu Pi Doi Thluai cun, “May 13 ni ihsin a hlo. Tuhlan khal ah a vak ṭheu ih zaan 9 – 10 hrawng ah cun a ra tlung sal ṭheu. Asinan tuṭum hi cu a ra tlung nawn lo. Kum 12 a si lai ah ni 3 sung a hlo dah ih Thantlang lam ah kan hmu leh sal” tin` a sim.
Van Lian Mang hi Lichia khau ah hmuh netabik a siih cuih zaan nazi 8 hnu in an hmu nawn lo. Cawbuk ih a sungkhat pawl in Lichia khua ah zaan hnih riak rorin an hawl nan tu ni tiang an hmu thei hrih lo.
Van Lian Mang a hmutu nan um pang a si len The Chin Journal Phone – 09445672734 ah theihter dingin zangfah kan lo dil.
The Chin Journal

 Cu lakah midang caah sullam a ngeimi a um bangin sullam ngei lo zong a va tam ko lai. Cu nih cun a tling kho lomi minung ka si kha a langhter.

uh lomi hna cu thinhung lo tein unfriend, like le block khawh kan si ko.

City Hunter| 2018 March 5| Mehhang tamhmawih le eidin tirawl ah hman ngaimi Aithing cu a dangdang ngandamnak ca zong ah sii tha taktak an si. Mizapi nih an hngalh rih lomi aithing a that khunnak phun 10 in kan hun langhter lai.
1. Nau inn cancer a runven khawh.
2. Ralpi cancer a runven khawh.
3. Naupawi liomi nu hna caah a tha tuk.
4. Takpum, kut, ke fakmi caah a tha tuk.
5. Thinphan thlalau le lungtor a daihter.
6. Zunthlum zawtnak a ngeimi ca ah a tha tuk.
7. Lufah a damter.
8. Nu pawl pawfah/paangfah a damter.
9. Tlangrai le tolbo zawtnak a runven khawh.
10. Fa ngeih khawhnak cikor a thatter.

Nagaland-ah chuan Malaria vei an tlem tial tial a, kum 2009 a 8,479 atangin kum 2022 ah chuan panga chauh an awm a, malaria vanga nunna chan pawh hetih hun chhung tho hian 35 atangin pakhatmah awm lovah a tlahniam tiin Health Department official te chuan an sawi.
Heng thute hi State Programme Officer, National Vector Borne Disease Control Programme (NVBDCP), Dr. Neisakho Kere an World Malaria Day a ‘Time to deliver zero Malaria: invest, innovate, implement’ tih theme hmanga thusawina a neiha a s
... (206 chars skipped) ... 
trict dangah te chuan hmuh an ni tawh lo tiin a sawi.
Hetih hun chhung vek hian Malaria avanga nunna chan tam ber kum chu 2006 kha niin mi 75-in nunna an chan a, kum 2009-ah 35 in an chan a, kum 2016 khan pakhatin nunna chanin kum 2017 atanga 2022 thlengin malaria avanga nunna chan an awm tawh lo a ti bawk.
“State-a Malaria PF case chu kum 2009 khan sang berin 2,893 an awm a, kum 2022-ah chuan pahnih chauh an awm tawh a, Malaria Pv case chu kum 2009 khan 5,596 awmin kum 2022 ah pathum chauh an a
... (206 chars skipped) ...
n khawvel puma nunna chhattu lar ber a ni a. Pv hi hlauhawm tak ni mahse nasa lo zawka ngaih a ni a, a pahnih hian hriatchhuah vat chuan tihdam theih a ni ve ve a ni.
India-in kum 2030-ah malaria umbo hmana tum laiin Nagaland a district pariatah chuan malaria hmuh a ni tawh lo bawk a.
State-a National Centre for Vector Borne Disease Control chuan malaria-free Nagaland siam nan hma a sawn takzet tiin Principal Director of Health and Family Welfare Department, Dr. Vibeituono M. Sachu chuan a sawi.

President U Thei Sei hun atang an lo chawlh tir tawh Irawady lui hnara Chinain Hydraulic power project chu tun NLD hunah hian chawl hlen tir ni ngei se tih ram danga awm kachin unaute chuan an ngen a ni. Ram chhunga kachinten he project hi an kalh lo tih China Embassy atanga thuchhuak a awm ve leh ram chhung leh pawna Kachinten an duh loh thu an rawn au chhuahpui ta a ni.
Sipai sorkar lai atang tun NLD thleng hian he project chungchanga an lungrualna leh khaah eng engte nge awm pawh mipuiten hriat kan nei lo va, puitlin tak tak ta se keini Kachin hnam chauhvin kan tuar dawn lova, kawlram mipuiten kan tuar vek dawn a ni tih thu Canada rama kachin unauten an sawi.

Kolasib District-a Tuirial Hydro Electric Project, kawlphetha megawatt 60 pe chhuak thei tura siam chu tun thla ni 16, kar leh Inrinni-ah PM, Pu Narendra Modi-an a hawng dawn. PM-in Mizoram a rawn tlawh tur programme hi nimin khan tihchian niin sorkar lam a\anga thu dawn a ni a, nimin vek khan inbuatsaih dan tur chungchangah Chief Secretary, Pu Lalmalsawma hovin mi pawimawhte an \hu khawm nghal a, Inrinni khian PM hian Lengpui \umhmun a\angin |huampui Helipad a pan ang a, chuta \ang chuan Lammual pan lehin Lammuala vantlang inkhawmah thu a sawi ang a, Lammuala inkhawmah he Hydel Project hi a hawng dawn a ni. A hawnna inkhawm zawh fel hnuah Aizawl chhuahsanin Meghalaya lam a pan leh ang.
Kawlphetha megawatt 60 pe chhuak thei tur Tuirial Hydel Project-a kawlphetha siam chhuahna khawl pahnih chu en chhin a lo ni tawh a, unit khatna, megawatt 30 pe chhuak thei tur chuan tun hma deuh a\ang khan a kawlphetha siam chhuah Bawktlanga 132 KV Sub Station-ah chhunglutin Mizoram mipuite hman turin a lo pe lut tawh \hin a ni. Puan tawh \hin angin Tuirial Hydel Project kawlphetha siam chhuah megawatt 60 zinga za zela 12 chu Mizoramin a thlawnin a dawng dawn a, hei hi megawatt 7.2 vel a tling a, a bak zawng pawh Central Electricity Regulatory Commission-in a leina rate tur a bithliah angin Mizoram sorkarin a lei dawn a ni. Power Deptt. hotute hnen a\anga thu dawn danin, he Hydel Project hi hawn a nih hun chuan Mizoram kawlphetha mamawh thui tak phuhruk theih a ni tawh dawn a ni.

RALHRANG NIH AN TLAIHMI HNA BIAKHIAHNAK AN TUAHPIAK HNA. Lai ramkulh, khualipi Hakha khua ah tlaih a tongmi sualnak ngeilo mizapi hna cu ralhrang nih 29 Chiapa ah minung 8 cungah biakhiahnak an tuah piak hna i, minung 5 cu kum 8 thongtla ding le a dang minung 1 cu kum 2 thongtla dingin bia an khiah piak hna, nu 2 zong CDF menber an si ti sual phawtnak an tuah hna.
Ralhrang nih biacaihnak an tuah ahhin anmah lila nih biachimpiaktu ( Lawyer ) an tuan i, tazacuai le tlaih a tongmi hna nih biachimpiaktu ( Lawyer) i hlannak nawl an ngei lo. Credit: The Lairam Times. Thawngpang dang. Gangaw Ah Thil Caw Ding In A Chuakmi Palik 3 Cu PDF Nih An Kah Hna I, Palik 2 An Thi:
Magwe ramṭhen, Gangaw peng Min khua palik sakhan in thil cawk ding ah a chuakmi palik 3 cu lampi ah rak bawh in kan kahdoh hna, tiah PDF-Gangaw(thlanglei) chungtel pakhat nih a chim. Nizaan July 30, chun suimilam 12:30 hrawng ahkhan palik 3 cu PDF nih an kah hna i, palik 2 cu an thi nain pakhat cu kuan hliamhma he a zaam, tiah theih a si.
An ṭhutnak dawr chung ah kutser bomb 40 mm kan chehhnawh hna hnu ah kan kah hna. Auto meithal kan ngeih rih lo caah 40mm kutser bomb lung khat, 380 pistol pakhat le rifile pakhat he kan kah hna,” tiah PDF-Gangaw chungtel pakhat nih a chim. Palik sakhan lei nih cun minung 1 lawng a thi tiah thawng an thanh nain, kanmah PDF lei nih palik 2 ruak cu kan hmuh caah a thimi cu 2 an si tiah kan fehter, tiin PDF lei nih an chim.

Chin State bup ah Kawlla (Traditional & Modern) lasak kidemna om a, tualaiah Tonzang Township panin Zomi min tawh Tg. Khual Cin Mung @ Cyi Mung St zong va kihel thei hi. Pasian hehpihna tawh 23-09-2016 in a khatna hong ngah in Pahtawina Laipi nih tawh Zogam hong ciahkik hi.
Amah pen kum 20 zong a cingh nailo khat hi in, a siamna a zat theih leh Music World ah minuai ah a om lo ding khat ahihna kilangh mahmah hi.
A pianna khua Tuikhiang hi in, Samte beh ahihi. A pianna Nu in dampih lai hi. Sanggam numei khat leh pasal li nei hi. A sanggampa Thawnpi St (Thunder of Zomi) pen Zomi Idol 2008 kidemna a thumna ngah in, Zomi sungah lasiam a min nei khat ahihbanah, ‘Tunnu Itna’ lakhui DVD zong a bawl khin khat ahihi.
Tg. Khual Cin Mung in Pasian piak a lasiamna tawh Chin State bupah Zomite hong lamsang suak ahihmanin ih lungdam a, ih angtang mahmah hi. A mailam kalsuanna ah Pasian in na ompih in na tonpih tawntung hen la, Zomite hong pahtawi zomsuak ta hen.

40th AR te chuan ‘Go Green Fortnight’ Programme an hmang chho mek zel a, Tuithum hnar khua ah ni 7.7.2012 khan Thingphun hnatlang a khua mipuite nen an nei a, thingkung mawi tur chi te, a rah eichi te leh damdawi a hman theih tur chi te an phun a ni.
Ni 10.7.2012 pawh khan 40th AR te vek hian an Programme kalpui mek Go Green Fortnight chu Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya Pukpui ah Principal leh Zirtirtu leh Zirlaite nen hmang in thing tiak engemawzat an phun leh a ni.
Mizoram ram ngaw chereu mek zel tur venhim a, thing leh mau humhalh leh thingtiak phun uar tur a Mizo mipuite kawhhmuh tu nih beiseiin he Programme Go Green Fortnight hi 40AR te hian an kalpui a ni.

Ui te hi mitam tak tan chuan chhungkua ang mai an ni a, ran ngainat awm tak niin an mahni enkawltu te hmangaihna bak phut let an nei ngai lo.
Central China’s Henan province a mi Mr Shao leh a ui kum 3 a upa golden retriever,Mao Mao te awmdan hian mite thinlung a khawih hle a, Mr Shao hi high blood pressure leh heart disease vangin Ventilator nen enkawl ngaiin a awm a ni.
Hetih lai hian a ui Mao Mao chuan kalsan chu sawi loh a bulah a awm chawt a, a pu mutna khum ah a awm (chest) ah beiin hmun dang reng a kalsawn theilo.
Shao chuan reporters te hnen ah ventilator a vuah a hmuh hian a ui Mao Mao chuan a damlo a ni tih a hrethiam tih hairual lohin a hmuh theih thu a sawi a, hetiang ui fing tak leh smart hi a la tawn ngai loh thu a sawi ve hial bawk.
Video thlir tu Netizens tam tak in an hmuh dan an sawi chuan mi pakhat in “ui te hian mihring ang chiahin engkim an hre vek a, chhungkaw dik tak an ni” tiin a sawi. Midang pakhat leh in a thil tawn ang deuh chiah a tarlang ve a, a damloh laiin a ui chu a bulah a awm tlat a, engmah a ei duh loh thu leh a lungngaih zia a tarlang.
Kar liamta mai pawh khan Turkey ah ui pakhat chu a lar chiam tawh. A enkawltu nu chu a dam loh vangin ambulance in damdawiin ah an hruai a, ambulance um hian an hnungah tlanin an inhmuh leh hma ni 6 chhung zet chu pawn lamah rinawm takin alo nghak a ni.

Vawiin khan Lunglei HPC Vice-Chairman Pu S.Laldingliana hovin ama office chamber-ah Lunglei Town Area chhunga Parking Fee khawn dan tur chungchang meeting neih a ni a. Pu S.Laldingliana chuan Lunglei Town Area chhunga felfai leh mumal zawka traffic chevel theihna tur leh parking fee khawn chungchanga HPC kaltlangin hmalak ni mek chu thuneitute bakah mipui zawng zawngten thlawp tha se a duh thu a sawi.
Vawiin meeting-ah hian ni 1 February 2016 atangin parking Fee khawn tan ni se tih leh Parking Fee khawntu tur Tender DTO-in koh se tih te rel a ni a. Goverment Approval No.B.12021/5/95-TRP.Dt.2nd Nov.2015 angin Lunglei Town chhunga Parking Fee, Roadside Garaging Fee leh Reserved Price tur chu a hnuaia mi anga hman tur a ni :
A. Parking Fee (in Rupees) :
B.Roadside Garaging Fee (in Rupees)
C. Reserved Price (in Rupees) :
Reserved Price erawh chu khawchhung hunglai leh khawpawn chu STA pawmpuinain tihdanglam hret a ni ang. Vawiin meeting-ah hian SP, SDC (DC aiawhin), DTO, HPC Member-te, MVI, Traffic OC, I&PR, STA Member Pu Lallianzuala leh MJA Lunglei OB te an tel.

Zirmiten an sawi danin mouthwash hi hman a nih atanga second 30 chhungin COVID-19 hrik a thi thei tih an tarlang.
Cardiff University scientist-te chuan mouthwash ah hian Cetylpyridinium chloride (CPC) 0.07% a awm tih tarlangin, hei hian taksaa virus lut tur chu a lo dahtha thei tih an sawi a ni.
He chanchin lawmawm tak hi Cardiff, University Hospital of Wales a clinical trial neih a nih dawnin damlo chila virus awm chu mouthwash hian a thunun nge thunun lo tih zirchian a nia, an thil hmuh chhuahte chu chipchiar takin 20121 ah tarlan a ni dawn tih an sawi.
Dr. Nick Clayton pawhin Mouthwash chu ka rim tuina a nih mai piahlamah Coronavirus dona hmanraw pawimawh tak a ni tel tih sawiin kutsil, social distancing leh mask vuahte nen hian an pawimawhna a dang chuang lo tih a sawi. Tuna atanga reivakloah chuan mouthwash hman chu Covid-19 natna dona kawngah tihmakmawh a la ni dawn tih a tarlang bawk.
Tun dinhmunah khawvel pumah 54 million zetin COVID-19 an kai tawha, US leh Europe hmun tam zawkah inkhuahkhirhna nasa taka kalpui tum mek a ni.
India ramah pawh khawvel huapin New Delhi khawpui chu COVID-19 in a nuai nasat ber hmun pakhat a tling a ni. Mithiamten inkaihhruaina dan an siamte kan zah thiam a tul khawp mai.

Tuna kalphung pangngaiah chuan Assembly bial tin-a Polling Station pangaah VVPAT hi zel chhiar tel zel tur a ni a, Chief Justice Ranjan Gogoi chuan thupek an lo siam tawh sa chu tih danglam an tum lo tih a sawi. April ni 8-a hemi chungchang ngaihtuah a nih khan Election Commission chuan Assembly bial tina vote tla a\anga VVPAT hi chhiar zel a nih dawn chuan result puan hun a tlai phah thei dawn tih Supreme Court ah hian a thlen a, Supreme Court hian Election Commission hi VVPAT khawl hi Assembly bial tina polling station panga ah tal chhiar zel turin a hriattir a ni.
VVPAT tam zawk chhiar tura ngenna thehluttu party te aiawha ding Senior Advocate AM Singvi chuan EVM leh VVPAT-a vote tla te a inmil em tih enfiah dan tur, tuna ruahmanna dinglaiah hi chuan vote tla zawng zawng a\anga zaa 2 vel chauh finfiah a ni a, zaa 25 vel tal finfiah a nih theih nan VVPAT tam zawk chhiar a ngai a ni a ti a, hetihlai hian Supreme Court hian eptu party te ngenna hi hnawlin, Assembly bial tina polling Station panga zelah VVPAT chhiar tur tia a thupek a lo siam tawh chu a nemnghet nawn leh a ni.

Vawiin khan Lawngtlai DC Conference Hall-ah Vigilance Awareness Week, 2019 pualin hun hman a ni.
He hun hi Lawngtlai Bawrhsap Pi Shashanka Ala, IAS chuan kaihruaiin, kal khawmte lawmna thu a sawi a. Hna thawhna hmun leh ni tin nunah rinawmna kan nunpui chuan hlemhletnain min tibuai pha ngai lo vang tiin, officer kal khawmte chu dik taka hna thawk a, duhamna inbawih behtir lo turin a chah.
He hunah hian Lawngtlaia state sawrkar leh Lai Autonomous District Council (LADC) hnuaia officer-te an kal khawm a. Mizoram sawrkar Vigilance Department hnuaia Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB)-a Inspector, Pu Jerry Lalrinsanga chuan hlemhletna leh ei ruk do chungchang leh thil dik lo hai lang tura ACB hna thawh dan te a sawi fiah a. Additional Superintendent of Police Pu C. Lalruatkima kaihhruaiin kal khawmte'n rinawmna nunpui turin thu an tiam a. Election Officer Pu Lalremruata Sailo chuan lawm thu sawiin, hun khar a ni.
Vigilance Awareness Week hi sawrkar laipuia Central Vigilance Commission thu angin kum tin Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel-a piancham (October ni 31) chhung khungin hman thin a ni a. Hlemhletna leh ei rukna tibo tur leh a laka inthiar fihlim tura inzirtir tharna leh intiam tharna atan hman thin a ni. Kumin hian October ni 28 atanga November ni 2 thleng he chawlhkar hi hman tur niin, thupuiah 'Integrity - A Way of Life (Rinawmna - Nunphunga Neih)' tih chu hman a ni.

The Chinland Post | 2023 August 11 — Shsn ram chaklei, Lashio peng ah TNLA le SAC ralkap karlak ah ni 2 chung pehzulh in kahdohnak a chuak tiah TNLA nih thawng an thanh.
August 10 ah TNLA Brigade 6 hmunhma, Lashio peng, Nanlawng khua pawng ah PSLF/TNLA sakhaan cu SAC nih Helicopter in a kah hnu ah kahdohnak a chuah hi a si.
Chun sml 2 hrawng ah kahdohnak Helicopter nih a rak kah i sml cheu a rauh hnu ah SAC ralkap le TNLA hna karlak ah kahdohnak a chuak i sml 4 hrawng a rau.
SAC Infantry 16, Infantry 68 le TNLA karlak ah kahdohnak a chuah hi a si i SAC lei a thi mi an um ko tiah an langhter.
Sihmanhsehlaw SAC ralkap a thi mi cazin a fiang in kan thei rih lo tiah TNLA nih an thanh.
SAC ralkap le TNLA ralkap cu August 9 zong ah chun sml 1:30pm in zaanlei sml 5:00pm tiang kahdohnak a fak tiah theihternak an tuah.
Cun SAC ralkap nih thazang a chap chin thluahmah tiah TNLA nih a thanh fawn.
TNLA le SAC ralkap cu July thla chung zong ah kahdohnak a fak i July 23 tiang ah kahdohnak voi 11 a chuak i SAC chungtel 25 nak tlawm lo an thi i hliam a tuar mi zong an tam tiah TNLA nih a rak thanh.

Na nupi duhnak zulhpiak ve loin nu cu kheng ṭawl ding, thilsuu ding, inn zohkhenh ding, nau zohkhenh ding tiang lawng in na ruahpiak i a thluaklei le biaknak lei ṭhanchonak zong cawn ah tha na pek lo cun upat awktlak na si in kan ruat lo.

Nu te hna cu tiin zawnruahnak siloin nu namnehnak bia na hmurka in voikhat a chuah a si ahcun hmailei na nupi ding khi zaangfak ngai ngai a si manh cang.

The Chinland Post | 2023 February 1 — Thlanglei Shan ram, Moebye, Pekon le Kayah ram hna ah SAC nih hramhram in uknak a lak hnu kum 2 caan chung ah mipi 430 an thi tiah Progressive Karenni People Force – PKPF nih February 1 ah a thanh.
Hramhram in uknak an lak caan chung ah SAC ralkap nih an thah mi mipi 302 an um i ralzaam dirhmun chung ah a thi mi 128 an si tiah theih a si.
2021 chung hriamngan ruang ah a thi mi 23 an um i 2022 in 2023 January thla tiang ah mipi 46 an thi tiah a thanh
Kum 2 chung ah kahdohnak voi 562 a chuak i mipi hriamtlai 219 nih an nunnak an pek, SAC lei 1,581 an thi tiah PKPF cathanh chung ah an langhter.
SAC nih vanlei kahdohnak voi 190 a tuah i hriamngan le vanlei kahdohnak ruang ah biaknak lei inn 28 a rawh leng ah mipi inn 1,317 a rawk tiah an thanh.
Atutiang tlaih/hren a si rih mi 279 an um i cu chung ah thih ding in biakhiah mi 4 an i tel tiah PKPF nih a chim.
Hramhram in uknak lak caan kum 2 chung ah mah umnak hmun a kir kho rih lo mi ralzaam sing 2 hrawng an um tiah Karenni nihrin covo phu nih an chim.

Total Bandh hi tlai lam dar 5:00 khan khar niin Bandh avang hian harsatna leh buaina thleng hriattur a awm lo ani.

Billie Eilish-i’n social media app a phone atangin a delete vek
Billie Eilish chuan a phone atangin social media app zawng zawng a elete vek a, “Internet-a ka thil chhiar te hi ka awih leh mai thin a,” tiin Conan O’Brien Needs A Friends: Musician Series-ah a sawi a, internet chu a thanlen pui a ni a, mahse, tunah chuan hlatsan rih a thlang ta zawk niin a sawi bawk.
Billie Eilish chuan, “Ka en ngai tawh lo. Ka phone atangin ka delete velk a, chu chu ka tan chuan thil harsa ve tak a ni,” a ti a, naupan laia internet khawih nasa, thian pawh kawm hman mang lo a mahnia inawm tlei, computer leh computer game-in a chawm len a ni a, mahse, a tleirawl tan a, chutah chuan a internet khawih dan chu a danglam tan niin a sawi a, “Kan tleirawl a, internet-ah mi chi hrang hrang an tam a, keipawh chung zinga pakhat chu ka ni ve,” a ti.
Kum 21 a tlin chuan internet-a a thil en te chu ama video leh chanchin te a tam ta hle mai a, chu chu a duh zawng a ni ta lo. Internet-a a chanchin miin an sawi te chu thudik lo tak tak a tam hle mai a, Grammy pawh pasarih dawng tawh Billie chuan, “Internet-a ka thil chhiar le hmuh te chu ka awih tlat zel thin a. Tichuan, chutiang chu thil atthlak tak a ni tih ka hrechhuak ta a. A engmah hi thudik tak tak a lo awm meuh lo chu a ni. Mitin thluakah hian dawt var tlem hi a inkhung vek a ni mai awm e, keimah ngei pawhin kan awih ve leh zel a. Internet-a ka thil chhiarah hian dawt engzat nge awm le?” a ti bawk.

Relchap : Kawl Ralkap nih Taal khua inn 7 an khangh, Falam Peng ah inn 30 tluk an khangh cang
Nihin October 25 zinglei ah Falam Peng Taal khua inn 7 Kawl ralkap nih an khangh i Falam peng ah inn 30 an khangh cang tiah kan theih.
“Hi Kawl ralkap pawl hi kan khua Thlanrawn lei ah an ra lio. Kan khua inn a taang mi an khanghchap sual lai tiin kan thin kan i domh. Taal le Thlanrawn caah thla kan campiak ulaw,” tiah Calvary Thang nih a facebook cahmai ah a tial.
Kawl ralkap nih Falam Peng ah Rialti khua inn 10, Thlanrawn ah inn 13 le Taal ah inn 7 tiin an khangh cang, tiah kan theih. The Hakha Time

Hakha Pearl Store nih HBDO sin ah Oxygen (40) litter der 20 le Flow meter pa 20 an hlut
August 27, 2021
Hakha kan chiat kan tthat ah a kan zuan hnawh zungzaltu Pearl Hakha (Pearl Store -A Han, a Far le a tu le rual) nih HOPE Blood Donor Organization(Hakha) in mizaw Oxygen bawmh chanhnak
caah (40) Litter Oxygen dur(20) le Flow meter pa(20) an kan hlut.
Hakha mizaw le midam vialte aiawh in HBDO-Hakha nih kan lung lomhnak kan phuan.
A tu lio ah mizaw (52) nih HBDO-Hakha Oxygen cu an dawp lio cuahmah. An herhzat in kan pe kho hna lo. A tu hin cun tam tukte kan bawmh khawh cang hna lai.
HBDO-Hakha kan dirh thawk 2004 kum in nihin tiang ah Hakha khuachung khuasa sin in Phaisa tamcem a kan hlumi(a kan bawmmi) an si.
Pathian Bawipa hrimhrim zong an cung ah a thanuam ko seh. Bawipa biakam bang(Luke 6:38) thluachuah zaahe lam hruai zungzal ko hna seh. .
Lawmhnak chim cawk lo he,

ICJ biaceih zung hmai ah Suu Kyi dirpinak an langhter. Myanmar cozah hruaitu hna Suu Kyi hruainak in JCJ biaceih zung an chuah.
Nihin ICJ biaceih zung ah a ni hnihnak ni ah Kawlram mi tampi hna nihcun Suu Kyi kan in dirpi ko ” we stand with Daw Aung San Suu Kyi” tiah an au hna.
Kawlram cozah hruaitu hna Suu Kyi tel in IOC ram 57 hna ai awh in Gambia ram nih ICJ vawlei biaceih zung ah taza an cuai hna. Nizan December 10, 2019 kha Gambia ram nih an chim i nihin December 11, 2019 nih Kawlram lei nih an chim ve. Thaizing lei hi Gambia ram lei nih an chim than rih lai.
Kawlram chung khuapi ah minung tampi hna nih Suu Kyi kan in dirpi ko tiah an langhter cio hna. Cu lio ah ICJ zung hami ah Suu Kyi le Min Aung Hlaing hna cu misual an si ICJ kan dirpi tiah Rohinya pawl zong ICJ biaceih zung hmai ah an au ve.

... (3657 chars skipped) ...

Vawiin March ni 4, 2012 (thawhtanni) khan Parliamentary Secretary, Pu S.Laldingliana chuan a bial chhung khua Tawipui North-II-ah Tawipui North-II Branch YMA huaihawt C.Rosangliani Memorial Running Football Tournament a hawng.
Pu S Laldingliana chuan infiammi kalkhawmte hnenah fuihna thu sawiin thalaite chu taimakna leh tumruhna nena an kal a nih phawt chuan Mizoram chhung chauh ni lo, India ram leh ram pawnah pawh kan lang thei a ni tiin chutianga hlawhtlinna nei tur chuan ruihhlo laka fihlim a tul a ni, a ti. Mizoram sawrkar-in thalaite hmakhaw ngaia Sports Policy hrang hrang a duante tarlangin Pu Dinga chuan sawrkarin thalaite duhsakna ti hlawhtlingtu nih tum theuh turin a fuih a ni.
He Tournament hi Pu C.Papuia leh Pi C.Hmingliani ten December ni 13, 2008-a boral ta an tunu C.Rosangliani hriatrengna atana an buatsaih a ni a. He Tournament-ah hian Tawipui Zone huamchhung Khaw 11 atangin Team 19 an tel a ni. Hawnna inkhawmahah hian Pu PC Lalrohlua, Pro-Pastor chuan hunserh a hmang a. C.Rosangliani sunna hun an hmang bawk.

Yum nak na pek gui ca Boi Gei
Bawi Gei htüm nak
Bawi Gei cuh a khmo yah ung hmeihta ah kya neh Bawphaya kya nak ah kyawng ung gawk tu ci. Ani cuh a düm hta ah om neh ca ktha na neh Kkhanpughi a kya ah a yum a phäh ah ca ngthei nak ung phi a ngming thang lo ci.
Bawiphaya a kya lo kon ah phi a gawk nak pang ung hmeihta gui mhtei hen du khaih ci gui phi a kya ah gung ci. Ani no a mhtei ah hmeihta gui cuh a pang hngu hmat lo u neh acoyah hngün gui ung bi tu ci gui phih da lo ci.
Cun bang ah kä kya neh ani no a mhtei ah du khaih ci gui, hmeihta gui cun phih Bawiphaya gui, mamah gui ah kya lo tu ci gui. A mshah cu tamah Saya ni, a pigo pang ung pahat lam khawngmang ci gui ah kya lo ci gui. A kho hei yung ah gawk neh kcho hta gui gung ci gui phi do lo ci.
A ni a shih yah ung ani a phäh ah thüi ci gui cuh ani ah bilawh ah phäh a phi Yei u neh Kkhanpughi shüm hmat ci gui.

Mizoram University-a Vice Chancellor nghet dah ngiat a Mizoram University Students’ Council hmalakna an thlawp thu Mizoram University Alumni Association (MIZUAA)-in an sawi.
MIZUAA hian nimin khan thuchhuah siamin kum hnih dawn lai Mizoram University-in Vice Chancellor nghet a nei lo chu pawi an tih thu te, Vice Chancellor nghet neih loh avanga University hmasawnna kal mekin nasa taka a tuar leh Administration thlenga a nghawng chu pawi an tih thu an sawi a. Vice Chancellor nghet dah thuai tura thuneitute an phut thu leh Mizoram University-in Vice Chancellor nghet a neih thuai theihna tura Mizoram University Students’ Council leh MZU hnuaia pawl hrang hrangte hmalakna chu an thlawp tlat tih an sawi a ni.
Hetihlai hian Mizoram University Students’ Council-in Mizoram University-a Vice Chancellor nghet dah ngiata nimin aṭanga zirna titawpa zirtirtute leh hnathawktute office kai tur an dan chu vawiinah pawh an la chhunzawm zel a. Buaina leh tharum thawhna erawh a thleng lo va, Unversity-ah Police ṭhahnem takin an awm chilh mek a ni.

March ni 14 leh ni 21 inkara Delhi Nizamuddin leh a chhehvel metre 250 aṭanga metre 500 bial chhunga Hmarchhak mi awm te ziahna list, Confidential Document pûtchhuak (leak out) nia lang pakhatah Mizoram nena inkungkaih vawi 24 a lang. Hei hi Mizoram Police-te chuan an chhui nghal a, hlauhthawnawmah an ngai lo nia thu dawn a ni.
Document thuhmahruai-ah hian phone hmangtute hi tuna an awmna a ni kher lo thei tih leh, phone number neitu hming hi tun dinhmuna a phone neitu emaw, kawltu emaw pawh a nih kher loh theih thu te, SIM Card book laia a book-tu hming leh chenna te tarlan a nih thu a inziak bawk a ni.
He Document-ah hian phone number 464 tarlan a ni a, heng phone-te hi a neitu hming leh veng-te nen a tam zawk chu tarlan a ni bawk a, Delhi Nizamuddin tlawhtu leh a chhevel paltlang an nih thu tarlan a ni a, helai hmuna ni 3 awm tlingte chu a rang thei ang bera thu zawhfiah leh medical screening tih tur an nih thu te a in tarlang bawk a ni.
He Document-ah hian Mizoram chu vawi 24 tarlan a ni a, heng zinga 20 chu Mizo an ni a, a dang 3 chu hnam dang an ni a, 1 dang leh chu company pakhat hotu hming a ni a, a vai hian “Low Risk” category-ah dah a ni a, hei hi a awmzia chu – ni khat chauh Nizamuddin-a châm emaw, an chhui ni (March 14 – March 21) inkara helai hmun paltlang emaw, an phone signal-in a man phaka awm tihna a ni.

COCOMI chuan nimin khan rally an huaihawt leh a, November 8 leh 9 hian zirna in hrang hrangah leh kawtthlerah 'human chain' siam an tum bawk.

Yangon International Airport ah ralhrang kahdohnak a chuak sual lai timi phannak a um caah Home Misnister hruainak in checknak an tuah, tiah theih a si.
Airport runvennak lei a chambau lo nakhnga le khualtlawng hna nih tihphannak um loin khual an tlawn khawh nakhnga riantuan ding in General Aung Ko nih Airport riantuantu pawl forhfialnak zong a ngeih hna.
Ralhrang pawl Myanmar ah luh ding in timhtuahnak an ngei tiah Malaysia palik nih thawng an thanh hnu ah atu bantuk in runvennak lei zohfelnak kan tuah hi a si, tiah Myanmar palik chimnak nawlngei Myo Thu Soe nih a chim.
“Myanmar ah ralhrang rat an tim tiah Malaysia palik nih thawngpang an chuahmi a um. Hi kong ah kan ram ca ah thinphannak cu a um ngai ko. Cun khualtlung luhchuahnak bik a simi Yangon Airport hi abiapi khun. Cucaah, runvennak lei zohfelnak kan tuah hi a si,” tiah Myo Thu Soe nih cun a chim.
May 14 ah khan Malaysia ah a ummi Myanmar Embassy telh in Buddhist biaknak sianginn pawl bomb puah a timtu ralhrang pali cu Malay palik nih an rak tlaih hna.
Cu ralhrang hna nih cun Myanmar ram zong ah kal in ralhrang kahdohnak tuah an tim, tiah Malaysia palik nih thawngpang an rak chuah.

MPCC in Political Party leh CM an ngen
Mizoram Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) chuan Kohhran in a khak ngai khawp leh Pathian rawngbawltute zahawmna ti hminghliau zawnga che tawh lo turin Political Party leh Chief Minister Zoramthanga an ngen tih an sawi.
Inrinni-a thuchhuah an siamah MPCC Media Department chuan Zirtawpni (Oct. 22, 2012) khan Chief Minister Zoramthanga chuan MNF kum 60 tlin lawmna inkhawm Vanapa Hall-ah thu sawiin, Pastor-te chu Zu zawrh sawimawi thin nia a sawi thu leh hetianga dawt hmanga intih hminghliau tum hi Pathian Kohhran rawngbawltu Pastor-te leh Kohhran diriamna leh zahlohna nasa takah an ngai tih an sawi a.Ram leh hnam thatna leh hmasawnna tak tak duh vang ni lo, lalna leh thuneihna chan tum ve avang ringawta Kohhran zahawmna tihminghliau zawnga Political party thenkhatin Pathian Kohhran ho hmanruaa an hmang duh chu pawi an ti takzet tih sawiin, “An beisei ang lalna leh thuneihna chan loh avanga chhuanlam atan Kohhran rawngbawltu Pastor-te zu zawrh sawimawi thin anga puh duh khawp Kristian State-in Chief Minister kan nei hi Congress Party chuan vanduai thlak a ti takmeuh bawk,” an ti a. MPF meuhin thuthar thehdarhtute hmaah thuneihna beisei vang ringawta Kohhran zahawmna leh ropuina tihminghliau zawnga che an awm thu an sawi a ngai ta mai pawh a pawiin an zahawm takzet tih an sawi a ni.

Kolasib 21st November 2020: Nimin khan DC Conference Hall, Kolasibah Food, Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Department Minister leh bialtu MLA ni bawk, Pu K.Lalrinliana kaihruaina hnuaiah Kolasib Town Planning and Development Committee te chuan thutkhawmna an nei a, Kolasib Master Plan ennawn lehna te, thutkhawmna hmasa a hmalak dan tur lo rel tawhte bawhzui a nih dante leh kalpui chhunzawm dan turte, Khuangpuilam Sector 2 atan a plan siam belhte leh Four-lane kalna tur lam a Truck Terminal awmna hmun tur te sawiho a ni.
Thutkhawmna chuan Khuangpuilam sector 1 a hmalakna tur hrang hrang duan lawk sa bakah Four-lane paltlangna tur hnaih lam a ruahmanna siam belh tha an ti a, Khuangpuilam Sector 2 atan plan siam belh nise tih rel a ni bawk. Geology and Mineral Resources leh Disaster Management & Rehabilitation department, Kolasib te chu Four-lane kalna tur hmunhma leilung him leh him loh thlithlai a zirchianna nei tur a ruat an ni a, Industrial area atan hmun ualau tak ruahman tur a tih a ni.
Vawiin thutkhawmnaah hian Pu Lallawmawma, Addl. DC, Kolasib, Er. Albert Vanlalliantluanga, Member Secretary, Kolasib Town Planning and Development Committee, Department hrang hranga thawktute leh khawtlang hruaitute he thutkhawmnaah hian an tel a ni.

Mission Indradhanush 3rd phase 3rd round thlirletna (review) hun leh 3rd phase a 4th round thlirlawkna (preview) hun hmangin mission target an siam te pawm nghal a ni.
Mission Indradanush phase 3 Round 3 ah hian target siam achievement chu overall in 81.40 % nu naupai ( raipuar) ah niin naupang kumhnih hnuailam ah 92 % a ni tih meeting hian a tarlang.
Round 3 ah hian khaw sawm huamin, Round 4 ah hian khaw 10 bawk tuam leh tum a ni. Chung te chu Zomuantlang, Khantlang, Andermanik, Belkhai, Hruiduk, Begabekia, Teprasara, Purana, Dampuipara leh Dilzawl te a ni.
Mission Indradanush 3rd phase a 4rd Round hi July 7 atanga 14 chhunga neih leh tum a ni a. Beneficiary list tha taka siam leh hri danna hi an la ngei em tih official ten cross check a verify leh thin tura beisei an nih thu meeting hian a tarlang bawk. Hri danna la tha te hnenah nachhawkna damdawi a thlawna sem thin ni se, Mamit District bikah hian khaw thenkhatah lo lam hnathawh avanga in lama awm lova, thlam kai an awm thin avangin hri danna pek kawngah harsatna awmte tarlan a ni a, 4th phase mission indradhanush kalpui leh turah chuan fur khawchhiat reh fel deuhvah ni tawh se tih a ni.

Aizawl | Feb 3, 2023: Federation of Mizoram Government Employees & Workers (FMGEW) bultuma sorkar hnathawk páwl hrang hrangte (FEMSE Council) February 1, Nilainia Taxation conference hall-a ṭhukhawm chuan, a hun taka hlawh lâk leh dearness allowance (DA) sorkar laipui rate-a lâk phûta nawrh an rêl a; pen leh hmanraw dang hmang tel loa pisa kai (pen/ tool down strike) an tum.
FEMSE Council chuan, "Mizoram sorkar notification ding lai anga DA rate hi central rate ang zel min pek phût nan leh Central Treasury Rules anga kan hlawh a hun taka sorkarin min pek zel phût nan pen/tool down strike neih ni se, a hun tur leh a hun chhung chu office bearer-te'n rawn ruat fel rawh se," tiin thutlukna an siam a ni.

Nigeria gamah Suicide Bomb sukhamding in numei kizang
Nigeria gamah Sunday ni in numei nih in amau nuntakna piakhia in Suicide Bomb puakkhamsak uh cih BBC News in genkhia hi. Hih Suicide Bomb puakkhapna hangin mi 4 sipah a, adang mi 10 val zong liam uh cihi.
Hih Bomb puahkhapna ah amu khatin BBC te kiangah agenkhiatna ah “Bomb khat puaktam masa a, tua mun ah aliam abai te akihuh liailiai laitak in adang Bomb khat puaktam leuleu hi” ci in genkhia hi.
Hih Suicide Bomb kitapna pan misi leh cina te akem Doctor pa in agenkhiatna ah hih Bomb apuakkhamsak a, anuntakna apiakhia numei tepen kum 20 gualbek hipan dinghi cimawk hi. Saturday ni inzong Maiduguri acihna khua ah numeino kum 10 aphapan khat ii pumpi tungpan in Bomb puakkham ami 19 si cimawk hi.
Security Official te genkhiatna ah hih Bomb tepen agamla panin Remote Control tawh aki puakkhamsak hi ci uhhi. Bomb apuakkham masa pen azakciang in anihna Bomb apuanu patau gawpin lauthawngkawm in ataileh ama Bomb zong kitam in amahzong silawh veve hi.
Hih Bomb asukham kua cih akitheihcian lohhang in Islamist Group te mah ki ummawh hi.
Tua hi a, hih Bomb sukkhamding in azat numei te uhpen amau ut hihtuak masalo a, zawhthawh thutawh azat uh hihtuakmawk ahih manin mulkimhuai leh lungkhamhuai mahmah hi. ZD Sawltak

ZONET zawhna chhangin PHE Superintending Engineer Pu Lalropuia chuan, kumtin ruahtui tlak tirh lamah tui nu vanga harsatna hi tawk \hin mahse kuminah hian an harsatna tawh a nasa zual a, Tlawng panna kawngpui bula leivung paih an awm \hin avangin Tlawng lui fintu Serlui nasa takin a ti nu \hin a, lui dang, Tlawng fintu ten bawlhlawh chi hrang hrang a len tel \hin bawk avangin kuminah hian hasatna an la tawk nasa hle tih a sawi a. Tui nut dan tehna NTU ah mihring tana him chu chu 7 anih laiin Tlawng tui nut zawng hi 1005 lai te a thlen chang a awm tih a sawi.
Kumin May thlaa Cyclone Foni vanga Mizorama ruah sur khan Tlawnglui hi nasa takin a lo ti nu tawh a, Reiek kaia Pump house-a tui thlifimna khawlin a thlitfim zawh loh avangin ni 2 chhung tui pump theih a ni lo a, hei hian Aizawl khawpui chhunga tui sem pawh hapta 2 vel a tikhaihlak a, tuinu vanga harsatna an tawh ziaawm chho \an mahse, ruah a sur apiangin leivung paih vanga tui a nut leh \hin avangin tui in tur thlitfim kawngah harsatna tawk thei dinhmunah an la ding reng tih Pu Lalropuia hian a sawi.
PHE Dept hian Aizawl khawpuiah tui connection 53,324 a pe chhuak tawh a, Public point ring veng 5 an awm mek bawk a ni.

Wednesday, December 3, 2014
Lai Siangtho pen Pasian tawh kipanin, Pasian tawh tawp a hih manin, Pasian' Laibu kici hi. Lai Siangtho in, Pasian bang tawh kibanga, Amah tawh koici kizp ding cih, A hong theihsakna dinga Pasian' hanciamna a hihi. Pasian' thu ih muh khiat pak theih ding bang teng hiam cih en dih ni.
1. A nungta, a maan Pasian khat bek kua hiam? Jeremiah 10:10
Theih ding: Pasian pen lungsim seh leh phuahtawm thu hi lo hi. Upmawh sansat zong hi lo hi. A om taktak - "a nungta Pasian" a 
... (1196 chars skipped) ... 
h tungah Ama itna tung tuangpen hi. Amah thutang a hih hangin itna picing A neih manin hehpihna tawh kidim hi. A maan itna khempeuh Pasian' kiang pan hong kipan hi.
6. Pasian' tawntung pianzia koici kigen hiam? Phatna La 90:2; Hebrew 13:8
Theih ding: Pasian a om loh hun om ngei peuhmah lo hi. A om loh ding hun zong hong om ngei peuhmah lo ding hi.
7. Pasian' hih theih loh na khat peuh a om hiam? Matthew 19:26
Theih ding: Pasian pen vanglian tawntung a hih manin, Ama hih theih loh na khat beek om
... (1196 chars skipped) ...
ahmah napi hehpihna nei mahmah zel hi; pil mahmah napi dik mahmah zel hi; thutang mahmah napi thukhual mahmah zel hi.
Mihing in pianna a neih hangin Pasian in pianna nei lo hi. Tua a hih manin mihing leh Pasian kizakim thei ngei lo hi. Mihing in Pasian zonga, Pasian' deihna bangin gamta-a, Pasian lungsim a hih theih zaha a zil ciangin, lungnopna lianpi ngah thei hi. Mihing in Pasian a zon ciangin a mu theihna dingin Pasian mah in na huh hi. Pasian ih zon ciangin ih nuntakzia zong hong kikhel hi.

Chin state Tonzang pengah palek a ṭuanmi Thang Lian Pau, meithal in voi 4 a kaptu palek bawi chang Han Win Aung cu upadi ningin fakpi in azizut ding asi, tiah Chin state cozah biachimtu Sipin Vuanci nih a chim.
Sipin Vuanci U Soe Htet nih, “upadi ningin tuah a herh. Atu zong azi an zut ko cang lai. A kuttang minung hitin a tuah cu fakpi in azizut a hau,” tiah a chim.
Meithal kah a tongmi Thang Lian Pau nih Tonzang palek sakhan, state cozah, district palek zung, Hluttaw MP pawl le Zatlang Vuanci sinah report ca a pek hna.
December 14 ah Tonzang peng, Cikha-Zammi lamṭhen an phak lio ah palek bawi changtu Han Win Aung nih Thang Lian Pau cu 6mm meithal in voi 4 a kah nain a thi lo.
Aruang um lo piin a kah hi si. Thang Lian Pau nih a ṭih caah thing tangah a zaam i aa thup.
Palek bawi captain Aung Ko Ko nih, “ṭih hlah, keimah nih ṭavuan kan lakpiak lai,” ati hnu ah a rung chuak ṭhan.
Bia aa al balmi zong an si lo. Mah ni hi palek bawi chang Han Win Aung zuu a ri i a kahmi asi. Voi 4 a kah nain avoi 1nk cu saikal a khen, avoi 2nk le a donghnak cu vawlei a khen caah Thang Lian Pau a thih lonak hi asi.
“Aa ka kah hnu zongah Han Win Aung nih minung pakhat thah ahcun ting 100, 200 in nawl khawh asi. Atu ka kut cungah ting 20 a um aa ka ti,” tiin Thang Lian Pau nih media sinah a chim.
A kah lio ah mithmutu tehte palek 5 zong an um, tiah kan theih.

Aadhaar Card hi engkim nen link a ngai ta zel a, a hmain SBI Account nena link dan bik kan ziak tawh a, tun țum chu online ațanga PAN Card nena link dan ve thung i han bihchiang dawn teh ang. Kan awlsam phah tak mialin..
I PAN Card ah i Aadhaar Card i link duh a nih chuan:
1. I PAN Card number, i Aadhaar Card number leh i Aadhaar Card-a i hming inziah dan kha i mamawh dawn avangin in ring lawk ang che.
2. Aadhaar Card Seeding (PAN Card) Page ah hian lut rawh.
3. I PAN Card Number, i Aadhaar Card Number leh i Aadhaar-a i hming inziah dan ang thlap kha fill-up phawt rawh.
4. I have only one year of birth in Aadhaar Card kha tick rawh.
5. Chumi zawhah a hnuai i duh zawk zawk hian i ti thei ta:
a) Thlalaka code lo lang kha a hnuaia box ah khan i enter zawhah Link Aadhaar button kha i click mai ang
b) I network vang leh thildang vanga kha thlalaka code kha i hmu thei lo a nih thung chuan Request OTP kha select in SMS a i mobile a code a lo thlen hunah a fill-up na tur box ah kha code kha chhu lutin Link Aadhaar button i click leh mai ang. 'Mahse' awm ta erawh Aadhaar Card Registration a i number dah ngei kha OTP dawng thei tur chuan i la hman a ngai thung ang.
I lo hlawkpui ngei beiseiin duhtawk leh phawt ang..

Afghanistan Ram Ah Mizapi Eidin An Har!
Afghanistan ram ah miharsa bawmhchanhnak a tlawm tuk cang caah a minung nuai renglo nih eidin ah harnak an tong, tiah United Nations Assistance Mission in Afghanistan Ramiz Alakbarov nih a chim.
Milu 19 million renglo cu eidin an harsa i cu chung ah 6.6 million nih lakhruak in eidin bawmhchanh an herh, tiah a chim chap. Afghanistan ram ah 40 million renglo milu an um i cu chung ah 35 million cu mi harsa an si. Afghanistan ram ah cun chawlehnak a tlak tuk caah ramchung thilman zatuak ah 30% a kai, tiah theih a si.
Afghanistan ram cu kum 20 chung ramleng bawmhchanhnak in a rak dir i, cozah tangka zatuak ah 75% zong ramleng bawmhnak a rak si. A luancia kum ah Taliban nih uknak an vun tlaih hnu in ramleng bawmhnak cu an rak phih hna, a bik in Electric, Ngandamnak le fimcawnnak hna zong a hlan bantuk in a kal kho ti lo.CRD.THE CHIN POST

Nimin khan Mamit District Hospital-a doctor pakhat chu Covid-19 hri a kai tih hriatchhuah a ni.

Heng thil thleng avang hian hospital chu inthen thianghlim leh fimkhur thu hlaah contact tracing neih a ngaih dawn avangin nimin aṭanga ni 3 chhung lockdown a ngai dawn a, hemi chhung hian Emergency erawh a ngaiin kalpui a ni tur thu Medical Superintendent chuan thuchhuah siamin a sawi a, damlo na zual bak chu sawrkar dan dinglai angin in lamah tawmim turin a ngen a ni.

Chapchar Kut 2017 Working Committee chu nimin tlai khan an chairman Pu C. Lalzahngoa hovin a chenna In-ah an thukhawm a, Chapchar Kut hmandan tur kimchang an rel.
Chapchar Kut 2017 hi March 3 chawhma dar 11-ah Tumpui Field-ah hman a ni ang a, Kut Pa atan Pu Zodintluanga Minister, PHE etc. chu beisei a ni a. Kumin Chapchar Kut-ah hian Mizo hnam lam chi hrang hrang entir bakah zaithiam zai mawi tak tak ngaihthlak theih tura ruahman a ni a. Kut lawmna-ah hian kum 75 chin chunglam Kut chhimtur a kal te tan thutna a bika siamsak an ni ang a, mipa leh hmeichhia Kut chhimtu upa ber thlangin, lawmman siamsak an ni dawn a. Kut hmang tura kal naupang mipa leh hmeichhia ‘Hnam inchei’ a inchei nalh ber thlan chhuah an nih dawn bakah, kut nula thlanchhuah a ni bawk ang.
Handloom leh handicraft phochhuahna tur hmun siam tum a ni a, a duh apiang tana lei theih tura phochhuah a ni dawn a. Hei bakah hian Mizo thil hlu leh hlimthla hrang hrang phochhuahna ‘Archives’ a duh apiang tana tlawh theih turin siam tum a ni bawk.
Committee chuan Kut ropui taka hman a nih theih nan hmala tu tur hrang hrang te a ruat bawk a ni.

2548/2023-2024
Lawngtlai dated 30th October 2023: Mizoram Legislative Assembly General Election 2023 neih tur ah October ni 31 atangin kum 80 chunglam leh pianphung a rualban lo, vote thlak tur a Polling Station pan thei lote tan Postal Ballot hmang a Home Voting kalpui tan a ni ang.
Lawngtlai District chhung a 36-Tuichawng Assembly Constituency ah Absentee Voter, Home Voting titur mi 13 an awm a, 37-Lawngtlai East Assembly Constituency ah mi 79 leh 38-Lawngtlai West Assembly Constituency ah mi 11 Home Voting titur an awm a. Lawngtlai district pum ah mi 103 awmin Mobile Polling Team-ten an mahni inah an kalchilh dawn a ni.
Mobile Polling Team-te hi vawiin khan DC Conference Hall, Lawngtlaiah Nodal Officer-ten training an pe a, Team 4 an awm a ni. Polling Station a duty tur Polling Official-te tan Postal Ballot hmang a vote thlakna hun buatsaih a lo nji tawh bawk a ni.

Kalaymyo chaklei,Kalay-Latpanchaung lampi cung um mi Chin mi tampi khuasaknak Pyidawthar khua cu SAC nih mei in an khangh i khuami 2 zong an thah hna tiah kan theih.
Thazaang 100 tluk a si mi SAC ralhraang hna cu April 30 ah khan Pyidawthar khua an rak phan i dothlennak ralkap hna he kaphnih kar kahdohnak fak piin a chuak. Cu hnu ah SAC ralhraang hna nih cun May 1 zing in May 2 zaan tiang pehtlai in khua cu mei in an duah i inn zeizat a kangh bel fiangin theih a si rih lo.
Cu leng ah May 2 ah khan Pyidawthar khuami 2 cu SAC nih an thah hna tiah theih a si.a tu lio dir hmun cu SAC nih Kalay chaklei ah ralhmai nor thluamah rih dawh a si caah Kalay chaklei khua kip in mizapi hna cu Kalaymyo khua chung ah le Inda ramri lei ah an zaam hna tiah theih a si.

World Health Organisation (WHO) emergency expert, Mike Ryan chuan ram hrang hrangten hri darh tur venna atana inkharkhip, lockdown an puang chu thil pawimawh tak a nih rualin, lockdown puan ringawt hi a tawk lo tih a sawi.
Mike Ryan chuan, "A pawimawh ber chu tunge dam lo, tunge hri kai tih zawn chhuah a, dah hran vat a ni. Heng miten inkungkaihna an neihpui te pawh dap chhuak a, dan hran nghal zel an ngai a ni," a ti.
Ryan chuan China, Singapore leh South Korea-in hri kai nia rinhlelh test nghal zel tura dan khauh tak an siam chu Europe ramte tan entawn a ṭha hle tih a sawi. Hri darh tur hi kan khuahkhirh theih hunah, a hri taka hi kan bei let tak tak thei dawn a ni, tiin a sawi.

Vawiin chawhnu dar 1:00 khan Lunglei District Industry Sector hnuaia NLUP dawngtu mi 88 te hnenah 2nd Assistant Installment Puanthuikhawl sem a niin he hun hi Pu S.Laldingliana Parliamentary Secretary chuan a hmanpui.
Puanthuikhawl dawng tu mi 88 zinga mi puanthuikhawl lo nei tawh sa mi 9 te hnenah erawh NLUP hi pawisa fai a sem a ni thung. He NLUP semna inkhawm hi Pu H.Thangmawia General Manager, DOC Lunglei chuan a kaihruai a, Pu Zathangliana, Nodal Officer NLUP. Lunglei District chuan Technical Report a pe bawk a ni.
Pu S.Laldingliana chuan Puanthuikhawl a sem hma hian thusawina hun a hmang a. Kan sawrkar chak takin mirethei leh harsa te eizawnna tur ngaihtuahin tunah hian kan flagship programme NLUP chu theihtawpin a kal pui mek a. Vawiin a NLUP dawngtute hian a thlawn a NLUP kan dawn rual hian mawhphurhna sang tak kan kovah nghah a ni tih hriain a ti hlawhtlingtu nih i tum theuh ang u a ti a.
Pu Dinga chuan NLUP dawngtu, hmang diklo an awm leh zauh thin chu pawi a tih thu sawiin hei hi thil pawi tak a ni a, kan tih loh tawp tur a ni, chuvangin rinawm taka theihtawp kan chhuah a ngai a ni a ti bawk.
Khawl dawngtute hi Tailor Super deluxe pakhat, Overlock machine pakhat, Jenome My Style pakhat, hand Tools bakah a phurh thlenna tur Rs. 22,300 theuh pek an ni.
Tunah hian Lunglei huam chhunga NLUP trade dang Carpentry, Weaving, Agarbati Stick Making machine te pawh khawl a lo thlen veleh a sem nghal mai theih tura ruahman a ni.

Karen ram, Kawkareik peng ah mipi ralkap ṭangrual pawl le ralhraang ralkap cu ni 6 lenglo an do aw ih ralhraang ralkap 90 lenglo an thi zo tiah Lion Battalion Commando ralkap pakhat in Khit Thit hnen ah a sim.
Ralhraang ralkap thazaang tamzet cu January 20 ah ChungDu khua kiang khuate pawl ah um hmun khuar tim an tuah ih cuih ralhraang pawl cu mipi ralkap ṭangrual pawl in an va kap mi a si.
Mipi ralkap a si mi Lion Battelion Commando, KNU/KNDO le DKBA ralkap telin mipi ralkap le ralhraang cu January 26 tiang an kap aw.
Doawknak ah ralhraang ralkap an tuar na ih hmunhla ihsin ralthuam tum thawn voi 200 lenglo kap nakin siseh, vanzam thawn voi 10 lenglo bomb an thlak tiah Lion Battalion Commando ralkap cun Khit Thit hnen ah a sim.
Ralhraang ralkap an tuar na rualin hriamtum hmang in le vanzam thawn bomb an thlak ruangah mipi umnak inn 5 hnak ih mal lo a kaang ve.
Cun, KNDO ralkap ranksang pakhat le mipi ralkap 2 in ram le miphun hrangah nunnak an hlan ve tiah thuthang kan thei.

ST. CHARLES BORROMEO (1538-1584)
Siangbawi a cang hnga mi Siangngakchia, Siangbawi cannak Sianginn hna zohkhenhtu mithiang Charles Borromew cu Italy ram Arona khuafate ah 1582 kumah, a chuak. ... (351 chars skipped) ... 
`tha ngaingai. Charles cu Bupi biaknak phunglam kha a upattuk bantukin thlacamnak hna kha zeitikhmanhah rianrang in a cam lo. Mass ka tuahlio ahhin ka thinlung a vaihvuan a timi Siangbawi pakhat kha “Missa tuah ding in a rak chuah hlan, Ankifual i thlennak khanah zeidah na tuah tak, zeitindah naa `tamh” tiah bia a hal `than.
Bishop pa pakhat nih kei cu zeirianhmanh ka ngei lo a ti tikah Chales nih cu Bishop he pehtlai mi `tuanvo hna kha a `tialpiak hnuah `tuanvo pakhat cio a donghnak ah, “nang c
... (351 chars skipped) ...
annak hna cu hmunzakipah an cohlan cio a silo mei? Fakpiin dohnak a ing mi upadi phungbia hna chungah Siangbawi vialte khahmulmet a herhnak kong le aa tlak lomi Siangbawi hna cu `thawl awk an si timi zong aa tel.
Nikhat cu thlacamnak khaanah thla a cam lioah zuarthlai Siangbawi pakhat nih meithal in a kah. Asinain kuan cu a puan kha a khen ko nain a taksa zeihmanh tonghlo in a puan cungah a tan kha khuaruah har in an hmuh. St. Charles cu 1584 kum, a kum 46 ah Arona khua ah a thi.

LAIMI THLARAU LEI NAN TLAUNAK ARUANG
Laimi Pathian biatak nan hngalh khawh lo ning, Pathian duhning i Pathian nan biak khawh lo ning, Pathian thangtthat hmanh nan thiam lo ning, nan tlau le tlau lo hmanh nan i hngalh lo ning, biatak le thilhman nan char khawh lomi hi araung a um. Pathian biatak hmanh doh thlawrh i nan dohmi hi aruang a um. Araung tampi lakah pakhat cu Baibal caan tthen ning na theih lo caah a si. Baibal caan nan tthen thiam lo caah a si. Atawinak in ka ttialmi hi van zoh hmanh u
... (1392 chars skipped) ... 
 hi a si. Nawlbia zulhnak in khamhnak hmuh khawh a si ti lo. Saram thisen raithawinakin Pathian he remnak ser khawh a si ti lo. Tlawngbai kan ngei ti lo. Jesuh nih a tuah ciami khamhnak kha zumhnak in cohlan i khamhnak hmuh a si cang. A zummi poh chinchiahnak caah le bawmtu caah Thiang Thlarau pumpaakcio kha peek kan si cang. Biakin ah i pumh a si cang. Pastor, Elder le hruaitu dangdang kan vun ngei cang. Asinain, zultu hna chan le kan chan i ai lawh lo nak a um fawn. cucu nan tthen thiam lomi c
... (1392 chars skipped) ...
 um ti lai lo. Jesuh cu kan pastor, kan tukhal le kan siangpahrang a kan uktu a si lai.
A tawinak in kan chimh hna bia. Hihi nan theih lo caah Baibal i a ummi vialte nan cawh dih i nan tlaunak chan cu a si. Nan zumhnak hi phungki rawl a lo. Phungki cu inn kip i rawl a khawlmi an si caah an rawl cu meh phunzakip ai cawh dih. Na zumhnak hi nawlbia le zaangfahnak le zultu hna caan le atu kan caan vialte na cawh dih ve. An tuahmi theology hi “Phungki Rawl Theology” a si.

General Secretary - Rev R. Lalbiakliana & Retired Minister - Rev F. Sangvela te chu July 29, 2024 (Thawhtanni) khan South Asia Theological & Seminary, Bangalore chuan Honorary Doctoral Degree an pe.
General Secretary leh Rev. F. Sangvela te hi kar hmasa zirtawpni khan Headquarters chhuahsanin Banglore a pan a, Inrinni-ah thleng-in Pathianni-ah BCM Bangalore-ah hun hmangin Rev. F. Sangvela’n chibaibukna sawiin General Seceratry hian thuchah a sawi a, tlai lamah General Secretary te nupa hian Kohhran hote zanriah buatsaih sakin an kilho a ni. Thawhtanni-ah South Asia Theological Collage-ah Programme an siam angin an tel a, Doctorate Degree hi hlan an ni ta a ni. BCM Pastor zirlai te, BCM Bangalore-a Kohhran hruaitu ten an tawiawm a ni.
Hemi hun an hman zawh hian UTC-ah Pastor Quarters atana an lo ruahman te en-in UTC Bangalore hotute nen inkawmhona an nei nghal a, hemi tlai hian Rev. F. Sangvela leh Rev. R. Lalbiakliana te Doctoral degree thar lawmna atan an mahni tawiawmtute leh kohhran committee chuan BCM Pastor quarters (UTC Qtrs, Chinnapa Garden)-ah zanriah an lo buatsaih sak bawk a ni.

tar Wars trilogy original Harrinson Ford-a’n Han Solo lem changa a BlasTech DL-44 Heavy Blaster hman chu dollar 10,57,500-in an hralh! He silai hi Rock Island Auctions, Illinois, USA-ah an lilam a, he silai hi 1976-a ‘A New Hope’ tana an siam, pathum zinga hmuh tur la awm chhun a ni.
London props house Bapty kutchhuak a ni a, close-up shots leh publicity thlalak vela an hman thin a ni. A silai hi Star Wars set director Roger Christian-a’n an film siama hman atan a thlang a, armourer Carl Schmidt-a’n a remkhawm vel a ni.
He silai hi Khawvel Indopui Pakhatna lai pawha an hman lar Mauser C-96 ‘Broomhandle’ pistol bakah Indopui Pahnihna bawr vela hman lar MG81 machine gun flash-hinder leh rifle scope Hensoldt-Wetzlar kutchhuak te remkhawm niin an sawi.
A silai leh part hrang hrang hi film atan Bapty hnen atanga an hawh a ni a, film chan zawhah an pe kir leh a, anni hian an lo phelh darh leh ta a, mahse, 2010 khan Bapty neitu, Terry Watts chuan armourer Carl chu a remkhawm tir leh ta a ni.
An lilam hma hian dollar 5,00,000 vela hralh theih an inbeisei a, mahse, fans lamin an lo ngaihlu hle a, dollar maktaduai chuangin an hralh thei ta a ni.

February 5, 2024 (Rauthla) : ZPM Lai District Headquarters Lawngtlai President MC. Lalramchhana chuan mipuite beisei ang takin kan hotute hian hnathawh an tum a, an thawk mek bawk a ni, a ti.
ZPM Lai District Headquarters Lawngtlai chuan vawiin khan chhung inkhawm programme leh mi thar lawmluhna hun an office-ah an nei a. He huna thusawitu Pu MC. Lalramchhana, President ZPM Lai District Headquarters Lawngtlai chuan, "Political party dangte chu hun rei tak lo awm tawh leh, kum tam tak liam ta a lo din tawhte kha an ni a. ZPM party erawh hi chu kan indin thar mek chauh a ni a, chuvangin mi zawng zawng ZPM ah hian kan leng vek a. Ram siamthatna hna thawk turin lungrual takin ke i pen ho zel ang u" a ti bawk.
Vawiin hun an hmannaah hian tun hnaia ZPM party chhungkua aṭanga chatuan ram pan ta, Pu Michael Lalliannghaka (Bazar Unit Secretary) leh Pu K. Lalremsiama (Saikah 'U' Adviser) te sunna hun hman a ni a. ZPM party zawm thar mi duhawm tak tak lawmluh ni bawkin, an zingah hian Pu Lallura Chinzah ex-MDC, Pu VL. Hrina Tlumang MNF VC, Pu Sakhawliana te leh midang engemaw zat an tel a ni.
He hun hi Pi Lalchhuanmawii, President, Zonu District Headquarters-in a kaihruai a. Pu C. Vanlalhluna chuan hunserh hmangin, Pu B. Lalrinsanga, Treasurer hnen aṭangin zin report kimchang leh chipchiar tak ngaihthlak niin,. ZPM Lai District Headquarters Lawngtlai hruaitute leh town chhung ZPM member mi engemaw zat an kalkhawm a ni.

NLUP 2nd Phase sem runpui Mizoram hmun hrang hranga neih ni, vawiin 7 August, 2013 chawhma dar 11:00 khan Vairengte-ah pawh Serlui Cluster pualin neih a ni a, bialtu MLA Pu K. Lalrinthanga’n hmanpuiin SSO(C) Pu Lalchhanhima chuan inkhawm a kaihruai a ni.
Serlui Cluster ah hian chhungkaw 536 te hnenah 2nd Phase NLUP tanpuina - Agriculture-ah 26, Vety-ah 39, Soil-ah 231, Industry-ah 56 te leh Horticulture -ah chhungkaw 116 te an ni. Forest Department an awm lova, Sericulture chuan chhungkaw 3 hnenah an lo pe tawh a ni.
Semmna hmuna kalkhawm thahnem tak hnenah hian Pu Rinthanga chuan thu sawiin ‘NLUP chu Pathian lam tang programme a nih avangin, tluang takin Central lamin kan hotute dilna an tih hlawhtlin saka, an sem thei lovang titu ten sem leh a nih takah sum lokalna lamah an buai leh a mipui hnenah thudiklo an hrilh a, mahse miretheite hnenah a nihna dik takin sum a luh takah mipui an lawm em avangin, keini pawhin sawrkarna kan chan hnu ah kan sem ve dawn, a aia tha kan sem ang te tiin bum an tum leh mek a ni, a ti.
NLUP dawng tuten rinawmna leh taimakna nen chhungkaw eizawnna tura tan la turin Pu Rina chuan a ngen bawk.
